Posts.Content: I know how you are feeling. I was just married in November of 03 and was diagnosed in Feb of 04. My husband doesnt like to talk about it. He didnt even want me to tell anyone. He is a very private person. I just try to be there when he is able to talk about it. Feel free to email me if you want im also pretty young too 41 maybe we can go through this together. My first chemo treatment is tomorrow. Im praying for you Lisa
Posts.Title: Help for spouse
